author: bhargav
description:
Description: GUI for Ned Wright Cosmology calculator
Homepage URL: http://www.ast.leeds.ac.uk/~phybva/Bhargav_Vaidya/pyCODES.html
Version: 1.0

This is a simple graphic user interface for the cosmology calculator originally developed by Ned Wright. In this package Python Tkinter is used to create the GUI for the original CC.py code written by James Schombert. Check it out. !

Repo @ github : https://github.com/coolastro/pyCOSMOCAL.git
title: Resource : pyCOSMOCAL
